column5: to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States . Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website
column6: compiling reports on website activity for website operators and providing other services relating to website activity and Internet usage.  Google may also transfer this information to third parties where required to do so by law
column7: or where such third parties process the information on Google's behalf. Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google.  You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser
column8: however please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website.  By using this website
column9: you consent to the processing of data about you by Google in the manner and for the purposes set out above.

column1: 4.- Responsibility for possible illegality of the files that appear as search results.
Foofind provides a file search service that automatically generates results. This website does not reproduce
column2: distribute
column3: publicly announce or transform any intellectual property. The results generated by the users’ searches only show the links to files or pages that meet the search criteria entered and are not hosted on this website. The user is aware that THE COMPANY does not assume any obligation to control
column4: supervise or inspect the files or pages that are linked as search results. Nevertheless
column5: in strict compliance with article 17 LSSI
column6: Foofind shall remove all of those results that it actually knows to be illegal. THE COMPANY is not responsible for the reliability or security of the files that appear linked as search results
column7: nor is it responsible for ensuring that they are free from virus.  It is up to the user to protect their system with the necessary security measures.

column1: 5.- Notification of links to files that are illegal or that have been disseminated without authorisation.
THE USER can inform THE COMPANY of the existence of any file linked from Foofind that they know to be illegal
column2: or of which they have well-founded suspicions. THE USER who informs THE COMPANY of the existence of pages or files that are presumably illegal or disseminated without the appropriate authorisation

THE COMPANY reserves the right to remove links to files or pages it knows to be illegal or of which it has well-founded suspicions. THE COMPANY also reserves the right to use all technological measures that it avails of in order to remove search results which link to content that could be illegal or disseminated without the mandatory authorisation.
